original_title: Forcibly entering SLRC premises: Mervyn Silva appears in Court
original_body_lines: The Magisterial inquiry against former Minister Mervyn Silva over an incident that took place at Sri Lanka Rupavahini Corporation (SLRC) in 2007 was today fixed for November 7 by the Colombo Chief Magistrate's Court.
Mervyn Silva was present before Court as a suspect and the CID conducting investigations into this incident informed the court that they are conducting further investigations into the incident.

On August 17, 2022, the CID arrested the former Minister and subsequently produced before Court upon the Attorney General's advice over an investigation into an incident that took place at SLRC in 2007.
He was arrested for allegedly forcibly entering SLRC premises in 2007.
